Side Length Formulae: 
 Side Length = Diagonal / √2 
 Side Length = Perimeter / l² 
 Side Length = √Area

Diagonal Formulae: 
 Diagonal = √2 × Side Length 
 Diagonal = (√2 × Perimeter) / 4 
 Diagonal = √(2 × Area)

Perimeter Formulae: 
 Perimeter = Side Length × 4 
 Perimeter = (4 × Diagonal) / √2 
 Perimeter = 4 × √Area

Area Formulae: 
 Area = Side Length² 
 Area = Diagonal² / 2 
 Area = Perimeter² / 16

Radius Formulae: 
 Radius = Diameter / 2 
 Radius = Circumference / 2 × π 
 Radius = √(Area / π)

Diameter Formulae: 
 Diameter = Radius × 2 
 Diameter = Circumference / π 
 Diameter = 2 × √(Area / π)

Circumference Formulae: 
 Circumference = 2 × π × Radius 
 Circumference = π × Diameter 
 Circumference = 2 × √(Area × π)

Area Formulae: 
 Area = π × Radius² 
 Area = (π × Diameter²) / 4 
 Area = Circumference² / (4 × π)

Length Formulae: 
 Length = √(Diagonal² - Width²) 
 Length = (Perimeter - 2 × Width) / 2 
 Length = Area / Width 
 Length = (Perimeter / 4) + (1 / 4) × √(8 × Diagonal² - Perimeter²) 
 Length = {√2 × Diagonal² × √[Diagonal² - √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²)] + √2 × √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²) × √[Diagonal² - √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²)]} / (4 × Area) 
 Length = [(Perimeter / 2) + √(Perimeter² / 4 - 4 × Area)] / 2

Width Formulae: 
 Width = √(Diagonal² - Length²) 
 Width = (Perimeter - 2 × Length) / 2 
 Width = Area / Length 
 Width = (Perimeter / 4) - (1 / 4) × √(8 × Diagonal² - Perimeter²) 
 Width = {√2 × Diagonal² × √[Diagonal² + √(Diagonal4 + 4 × Area²)] - √2 × √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²) × √[Diagonal² + √(Diagonal4 + 4 × Area²)]} / (4 × Area) 
 Width = [(Perimeter / 2) - √(Perimeter² / 4 - 4 × Area)] / 2

Diagonal Formulae: 
 Diagonal = √(Length² + Width²) 
 Diagonal = √[Length² + (Perimeter / 2 - Length)²] 
 Diagonal = √[Length² + (Area / Length)²] 
 Diagonal = √[Width² + (Perimeter / 2 - Width)²] 
 Diagonal = √[Width² + (Area / Width)²] 
 Diagonal = (1 / 2) × √(Perimeter² - 8 × Area)

Perimeter Formulae: 
 Perimeter = 2 × (Length + Width) 
 Perimeter = 2 × Length + 2 × √(Diagonal² - Length²) 
 Perimeter = 2 × Length + 2 × (Area / Length) 
 Perimeter = 2 × Width + 2 × √(Diagonal² - Width²) 
 Perimeter = 2 × Width + 2 × (Area / Width) 
 Perimeter = {√[2 × Diagonal² + 2 × √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²)]} × {[(1 / 2) × Diagonal² + Area - (1 / 2) × √(Diagonal4 - 4 × Area²)] / Area}

Area Formulae: 
 Area = Length × Width 
 Area = Length × √(Diagonal² - Length²) 
 Area = Perimeter × (1 / 2) - Length² 
 Area = Width × √(Diagonal² - Width²) 
 Area = Perimeter × (1 / 2) - Width² 
 Area = [(Perimeter / 4) - (1 / 4) × √(8 × Diagonal² - Perimeter²)] × [(Perimeter / 4) + (1 / 4) × √(8 × Diagonal² - Perimeter²)]

Side Length Formulae: 
 Side Length = (2 × Height) / √3 
 Side Length = Perimeter / 3 
 Side Length = √[(4 × Area) / √3]

Height Formulae: 
 Height = (Side Length × √3) / 2 
 Height = [(Perimeter / 3) × √3] / 2 
 Height = {√[(4 × Area) / √3] × √3} / 2

Perimeter Formulae: 
 Perimeter = 3 × Side Length 
 Perimeter = 3 × [(2 × Height) / √3] 
 Perimeter = 3 × √[(4 × Area) / √3]

Area Formulae: 
 Area = (√3 / 4) × Side Length² 
 Area = (√3 / 4) × [(2 × Height) / √3]² 
 Area = (√3 / 4) × (Perimeter / 3)²

Side Length Formulae: 
 Side Length = (1 / 2) × √(Base² + 4 × Height²) 
 Side Length = (Perimeter - Base) / 2 
 Side Length = √[(16 × Area² + Base4) / (4 × Base²)] 
 Side Length = (4 × Height² + Perimeter²) / (4 × Perimeter) 
 Side Length = √(Area² / Height² + Height²)

Base Formulae: 
 Base = 2 × √(Side Length² - Height²) 
 Base = Perimeter - 2 × Side Length 
 Base = 2 × Area / Height 
 Base = (Perimeter / 2) - 2 × (Height² / Perimeter)

Height Formulae: 
 Height = √[Side Length² - (Base² / 4)] 
 Height = √{Side Length² - [(Perimeter - 2 × Side Length)² / 4]} 
 Height = 2 × Area / Base 
 Height = (1 / 2) × √[Perimeter × (Perimeter - 2 × Base)]

Perimeter Formulae: 
 Perimeter = 2 × Side Length + Base 
 Perimeter = 2 × Side Length + 2 × √(Side Length² - Height²) 
 Perimeter = 2 × √[(4 × Height² + Base²) / 4] + Base 
 Perimeter = √[(16 × Area² + Base4) / Base²] + Base 
 Perimeter = 2 × √[Height² + (Area / Height)²] + [2 × (Area / Height)]

Area Formulae: 
 Area = {Base × √[Side Length² - (Base² / 4)]} / 2 
 Area = (Perimeter × Height) / 4 - (Height³ / Perimeter) 
 Area = Height × √(Side Length² - Height²) 
 Area = (Base × Height) / 2 
 Area = (1 / 4) × Base × √[Perimeter × (Perimeter - 2 × Base)]
